chapters.title: Chapter 11:  Just Another Sell-Sword
chapters.info: Petra Anhill, p. 247—Former strongman in Valan Luca's menagerie, now a guard at the gates of Ebou Dar for the Seanchan-loyal government. He has arms like tree trunks. Husband of Clarine. He is shorter than Mat, but about twice as wide. He can straighten a horse shoe with his bare hands.
